title: Fruit of the Loom Men's Eversoft Cotton Short Sleeve Pocket T-Shirts, Breathable & Tag Free
description: Eversoft Cotton Men's Pocket T-Shirt, 2 Pack
Eversoft fabric provides premium softness wash after wash
Designed with moisture wicking and odor control
Double needle stitching throughout provides superior durability
Front left square chest pocket with reinforced stitching for durability

Our Men's Pocket T-shirts are a casual wardrobe staple that you are going to love to live in. Featuring a collar, super soft cotton and reinforced pocket, the Fruit of the Loom® men's Pocket T-shirts are designed for comfort and made to last. Each shirt has long lasting construction and quality that you can expect from Fruit of the Loom®. Live your life more comfortably with Fruit of the Loom® men's Pocket T-shirt. These are designed to wick moisture away, so you can stay cool and dry.
